# Unearthly Beauty (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Druid Spells|Druid 8]], [[Fey (Domain)|Fey 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, Abstinence

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 110

As *[[Blinding Beauty (Spell)|blinding beauty]]**,* but at any time during the duration of the spell, you can evoke an additional effect as a free action. When you choose, any creature within 30 feet of you that is looking directly at you must succeed on a Will save or die.

*Abstinence Component:* You must abstain from sexual intercourse for one month before casting this spell.
